lead_paragraph: Patric Hornqvist had his first career hat trick, beating goalie Louis Domingue three times as the Pittsburgh Penguins made quick work of the sinking Arizona Coyotes 6-0 on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Hornqvist's Hat Trick Powers Penguins Past Coyotes 6-0
headline.main: Hornqvist's Hat Trick Powers Penguins Past Coyotes 6-0
